description.displayText:
Caroline is a trustworthy, reliable person with a good work ethic and strong core values -- characteristics that make her especially well-suited for any type of care giving. And while I have never worked with her directly, I've known Caroline for many years now and know her to be an individual who cares deeply about people -- not just about their illnesses or conditions -- but about the whole person ... mind, body, and spirit.

Isn't that the best way to provide healthcare in these stress-filled days?
